sent.orig: This paper studies the modeling and optimization control of the job-shop network system with buffers.
sent.trans: 研究设置缓冲区的具有Job -Shop结构的一类网络系统的建模与最优控制。

sent.orig: Experiment results show the efficiency of AIA applied to Flow-shop.
sent.trans: 仿真实验表明：AIA求解Flow-shop是有效的。

sent.orig: Widely used in coffee SHOP, guesthouses, bars, KTV night clubs, fast-food shops catering establishments.
sent.trans: 广泛适用于咖啡SHOP、宾馆、酒吧、KTV夜总会、快餐店等饮食场所。

sent.orig: A harmonious production planning problem for multiple Open-Shop product lines with limited buffers is studied.
sent.trans: 本文研究了一类带有限缓冲区的多Open-Shop型生产线协调生产计划问题。

sent.orig: There is a simple beauty in ship, shop, walk, free, earth, mate, man, fried.
